attributes.additional_details:
The Succession the the Crown Act 2013 allows future Monarchs and Heirs to the Thrown, to marry Roman Catholics but not to be Roman Catholics.
The Government should consider by debating lifting the ban on future Monarchs and Heirs to the Thrown to be Roman Catholics also, which would disestablish the Church of England.
Also for the Head of the Commonwealth of Nations to become elected after the passing of the Queen.
